statements: SELECT id, report_title, report_date, reporter_name FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE id = 1;
SELECT report_title, reporter_name FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT report_date, report_title FROM regulatory_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, report_title, reporter_name FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_title = 'Financial Report';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, reporter_name FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_title LIKE '%finance%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT id, report_title, reporter_name FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_date < '2021-06-01' AND reporter_name = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT id, report_title FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE reporter_name = 'Jane Doe' AND report_title IS NOT NULL ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_reporting;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_report_views;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM regulatory_report_views ORDER BY view_name DESC;
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM regulatory_report_views WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT view_name, view_description, report_id FROM regulatory_report_views WHERE view_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reporting WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_name FROM regulatory_reporting ORDER BY report_name DESC;
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM regulatory_report_views WHERE report_id = 2 ORDER BY view_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_report ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM regulatory_report WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT report_name FROM regulatory_report WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM regulatory_report WHERE report_name LIKE '%ABC%'
SELECT * FROM report_view ORDER BY view_id ASC
SELECT * FROM regulatory_report WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM regulatory_report ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_name, d.data FROM regulatory_report r JOIN report_data d ON r.report_id = d.report_id;
SELECT r.*, v.view_name FROM regulatory_report r JOIN report_view v ON r.report_id = v.report_id WHERE v.view_name LIKE '%summary%';
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_name, COUNT(d.data_id) AS data_count FROM regulatory_report r LEFT JOIN report_data d ON r.report_id = d.report_id GROUP BY r.report_id, r.report_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM regulatory_views ORDER BY view_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description, rule_condition FROM regulatory_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%Compliance%';
SELECT field_name, data_type, is_required FROM regulatory_fields WHERE is_required = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, data_type, is_required FROM regulatory_fields ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT view_name FROM regulatory_views WHERE view_description LIKE '%summary%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_report
SELECT report_id, regulatory_type FROM regulatory_report WHERE regulatory_type = 'Type A'
SELECT entity_name, data_value FROM regulatory_entity JOIN regulatory_data ON regulatory_entity.entity_id = regulatory_data.entity_id
SELECT view_name, view_sql FROM regulatory_view ORDER BY view_name DESC
SELECT mapping_id, mapping_description FROM regulatory_view_mapping
SELECT * FROM regulatory_report WHERE regulatory_type = 'Compliance'
SELECT entity_name, data_value FROM regulatory_entity INNER JOIN regulatory_data ON regulatory_entity.entity_id = regulatory_data.entity_id
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM regulatory_report ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT view_name, view_sql FROM regulatory_view
SELECT entity_name, data_value FROM regulatory_entity INNER JOIN regulatory_data ON regulatory_entity.entity_id = regulatory_data.entity_id WHERE data_value > 100
